features.situation: in penalties may be ignored when due to close quarters

mdbVV0bekx2ydr577.name: Easy to Hit
mdbVV0bekx2ydr577.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

tI1bEEm0CDV-i8Zxi.name: Honesty
tI1bEEm0CDV-i8Zxi.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

tmCdexroverQSK8kP.name: Selfless
tmCdexroverQSK8kP.notes: You must make a self-control roll to put your needs – even survival – before those of someone else.
